replies.msg:
開左先，慢慢推

美國國會外交委員會聽證會
美國時間9:30 AM / 香港時間9:30 PM

週三上午9:30，
美國國會外交委員會將在瑞本國會大樓（Rayburn House Office Building）2172號房間舉行聽證會
主題為「一國兩制的終結？：北京《國安法》對香港的影響
（The End of One Country, Two Systems?: Implications of Beijing’s National Security Law in Hong Kong）」



美國官方直播link
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s9nuiXMugqY

大紀元會有中文（唔清楚係唔係廣東話）同聲傳譯直播，下面係佢地Channel
大紀元開左直播之後我會pin條直播link
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBRcyI55pANUU4Ofia75yEg


聽證會證人包括：
李卓人先生（Cheuk Yan Lee）香港支聯會主席
卡洛爾·J·彼得森（Carole J. Petersen）女士
威廉·理查森（William S. Richardson）法學院法學教授
松永（Matsunaga）和平研究所研究生院長，夏威夷大學在馬諾（Manoa）；
梁繼平先生（Brian Leung），博士生，華盛頓大學（University of Washington）。


（小小要求請唔好再盲屌大紀元，人地係反共方面真係做左好多野）

replies.msg: Carole J. Petersen practiced law for five years (in New York City and Honolulu) before moving to Hong Kong in 1989. She taught law in Hong Kong from 1989-2006. She was Director of the University of Hong Kong's Centre for Comparative and Public Law from 2001-2004 and also active in the University of Hong Kong's Women's Studies Research Center. She assisted members of the Hong Kong Legislative Council to draft bills prohibiting discrimination and has conducted extensive research on the use of conciliation to resolve complaints of discrimination and sexual harassment. Her current research focuses on: (1) human rights in Hong Kong and the challenges of implementing the "One Country, Two Systems" model since reunification with China in 1997; and (2) the rights of women and the rights of persons with disabilities under international and domestic law. In the 2006-2007 academic year Carole was a Visiting Professor at the William S. Richardson School of Law. She is now Professor of Law and Graduate Chair in the Matsunaga Institute for Peace and Conflict Resolution. In the Law School, she teaches International Law; International Protection of Human Rights; and Gender and Law.
